isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES - Valve Guides - Inspection

step1.para: Position an inspection light at the bottom of the valve guide bores and examine the walls for burning or cracking. Replace the cylinder head if it does not pass inspection.

figure.caption: Measuring the Valve Guide Inside Diameter

step1.para: Measure each valve guide for wear. Use an appropriate sized small hole gauge to check the inside diameter of the valve guide at the upper and lower ends at three locations approximately 120° apart. Measure the small hole gauge with a 0-1inch micrometer. Record the readings.
If any valve guide inside diameter is over the specification, replace the cylinder head.
